org.apache.flink.api.common.functions

类 RichFlatJoinFunction<IN1,IN2,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.AbstractRichFunction
      • org.apache.flink.api.common.functions.RichFlatJoinFunction<IN1,IN2,OUT>
  • 类型参数:
    IN1 - The type of the elements in the first input.
    IN2 - The type of the elements in the second input.
    OUT - The type of the result elements.
    所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, FlatJoinFunction<IN1,IN2,OUT>, Function, RichFunction
    直接已知子类:
    GatherSumApplyIteration.ApplyUdf, JoinOperator.DefaultFlatJoinFunction, JoinOperator.ProjectFlatJoinFunction

    @Public
public abstract class RichFlatJoinFunction<IN1,IN2,OUT>
extends AbstractRichFunction
implements FlatJoinFunction<IN1,IN2,OUT>
    Rich variant of the FlatJoinFunction. As a RichFunction, it gives access to the RuntimeContext and provides setup and teardown methods: RichFunction.open(org.apache.flink.configuration.Configuration) and RichFunction.close().

    • 方法详细资料

      • join

        public abstract void join(IN1 first,
                          IN2 second,
                          Collector<OUT> out)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
        从接口复制的说明: FlatJoinFunction
        The join method, called once per joined pair of elements.
        指定者:
        join 在接口中 FlatJoinFunction<IN1,IN2,OUT>
        参数:
        first - The element from first input.
        second - The element from second input.
        out - The collector used to return zero, one, or more elements.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - This method may throw exceptions. Throwing an exception will cause the operation to fail and may trigger recovery.
